sense.name: written communication
sense.examples: Mary was furious with her little brother for reading her love letters. They printed Sally's letter to the editor in today's paper. We haven't received a letter of intent from the prospective buyer.

sense.name: an alphabetic symbol
sense.examples: The scholar believes these are runic letters. Is this upper-case letter a 'D' or a 'P'? The Puritanical town forced the young woman to wear a scarlet letter. What is the third letter of the Greek alphabet?

sense.name: the literal meaning or interpretation of something
sense.commentary: LETTER[+quality][+meaning][+literal] Note: a figurative extension of sense 2
sense.examples: This is according to the letter of the law. You must follow my instructions to the letter.

sense.name: a school award for achievement in sports
sense.examples: Jim received his varsity letter in football this year. Sally's brother won letters in three sports.

sense.name: a property owner who leases
sense.examples: The letter of John's apartment lives above him in the third floor apartment. May I speak to the letter of this flat?
